hook_text: Sequences getting lost? Baby dragon's number train will guide them!

style_decision.reasoning: A 'Family Guy style' immediately points to a bold, exaggerated cartoon aesthetic. Vibrant colors are essential for capturing attention on Instagram and making abstract math concepts visually engaging for a general audience. This style allows for the visual metaphors requested (dragon conductor, train cars, epsilon tunnels) to be easily and humorously depicted, fitting the comedic tone and educational goals.

positioning_decision.reasoning: For Instagram's portrait aspect ratio, 'bottom_center' is ideal. It keeps the overlay out of the crucial upper 80% of the screen, preventing obstruction of the cartoon visuals. It's also generally a safe zone for information without interfering with key visual elements in the center or top.

ffmpeg_command: ffmpeg -i outputs/calculus_dragon_ep2_20250727_234743/temp_files/base_video.mp4 -vf drawtext=text='Convergence Zone 🎯':fontcolor=#96CEB4:fontsize=42:font='Trebuchet-Bold':box=1:boxcolor=#000000@0.9:boxborderw=2:x=(w-text_w)/2:y=1152:enable=between(t\,8.0\,11.0),drawtext=text='Squeeze Theorem 🤝':fontcolor=#2C3E50:fontsize=46:font='Impact':box=1:boxcolor=#000000@0.9:boxborderw=2:x=(w-text_w)/2:y=1152:enable=between(t\,18.0\,21.0),drawtext=text='Follow for More 🚀':fontcolor=#FF6B6B:fontsize=42:font='Arial-Bold':box=1:boxcolor=#000000@0.9:boxborderw=2:x=(w-text_w)/2:y=1152:enable=between(t\,23.0\,25.5),drawtext=text='Follow for':fontcolor=#FFFF00:fontsize=56:font='Anton':box=1:boxcolor=#FF0000@0.7:boxborderw=3:x=(w-text_w)/2:y=1720:enable=between(t\,19.3\,20.7),drawtext=text='more':fontcolor=#FFFF00:fontsize=56:font='Anton':box=1:boxcolor=#FF0000@0.7:boxborderw=3:x=(w-text_w)/2:y=1640:enable=between(t\,20.8\,22.2) -c:a copy -y outputs/calculus_dragon_ep2_20250727_234743/temp_files/timed_overlays_base_video.mp4
